detaileddescription.para: Check if the map name looks safe.
A map name looks safe when there are no special characters and no .. or // sequences. This way only real valid maps from the map directory will be loaded.

simplesect.para: true if the map name looks safe.

detaileddescription.para: Check if the Stratagus version and Network Protocol match
